#!/bin/ksh echo "--- Deployment ID: ${BUILD_TAG} - ${BUILD_ID}
" >> /opt/build/scm/scripts/buildServer/log/${BUILD_TAG}.log echo "Deployment to devint by Jenkins
" >> /opt/build/scm/scripts/buildServer/log/${BUILD_TAG}.log echo "Component: smsipub
" >> /opt/build/scm/scripts/buildServer/log/${BUILD_TAG}.log EXIST_VERS=`ssh tcserver@dvappdai01 "grep Implementation-Version /opt/tcserver/instances/smsipub/webapps/smsi-publisher/META-INF/MANIFEST.MF | cut -d : -f 2 | tr -d ' ' | tr -d '\r'"` VERSION="4.1.0_${BUILD_NUMBER}" print Gathering build version to be deployed print -------------------------------------- /opt/build/scripts/tcServerAdmin.sh dvappdai01 smsipub stop cd /opt/build/scripts ./kill_dbsessions.sh -a smsi-publisher -e devint ./drop_test.sh -a smsi-publisher -e devint cd /opt/checkouts/smsi-publisher/config/cisys echo "@genUser.devint.sql;" | sqlplus -s 'cm_system/oracle123@(DESCRIPTION=(ADDRESS_LIST=(ADDRESS=(PROTOCOL=TCP)(HOST=10.13.18.61)(PORT=1522)))(CONNECT_DATA=(SERVICE_NAME=scrum004)))' STATUS=${?} if [[ ${STATUS} != "0" ]]; then exit ${STATUS} fi cd /opt/build/scripts ./deploy.sh -a smsi-publisher -e devint -r ${VERSION} -v echo "DB Rebuild: yes
" >> /opt/build/scm/scripts/buildServer/log/${BUILD_TAG}.log echo "URL For Deploy output: console
" >> /opt/build/scm/scripts/buildServer/log/${BUILD_TAG}.log echo "
" >> /opt/build/scm/scripts/buildServer/log/${BUILD_TAG}.log echo "

" >> /opt/build/scm/scripts/buildServer/log/${BUILD_TAG}.log mv /opt/build/scm/scripts/buildServer/log/devint.html /opt/build/scm/scripts/buildServer/log/devint.tmp cat /opt/build/scm/scripts/buildServer/log/${BUILD_TAG}.log /opt/build/scm/scripts/buildServer/log/devint.tmp > /opt/build/scm/scripts/buildServer/log/devint.html rm /opt/build/scm/scripts/buildServer/log/devint.tmp rm /opt/build/scm/scripts/buildServer/log/${BUILD_TAG}.log
